summary: An ordinance providing for the modification and distribution of certain local improvement assessments against the West 161 feet of Tract 15 and the east 1/2 of tract 16, Plat of Alki Point, levied for the construction of a trunk sewer, and other improvements, in 63rd Avenue Southwest and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, as authorized by Ordinance No. 39803, creating Local Improvement District No. 3218.
